snippet.title: Apopia Game Teaser Trailer (2020)
snippet.description:
This is the first game trailer of Apopia! Play the FREE demo prologue on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1648210/Apopia_Prologue/

Please add the full game to your wishlist too:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1661610/Apopia_Sugar_Coated_Tale/

Apopia is a comedic adventure with dark mysteries. Help young girl Mai to find her way home. Progress by solving puzzles and outsmarting enemies in minigames. Make friends and foes with talking animals. Unravel the mystery of Mai’s identity from her dark and blurry memories.

Sign up to Apopia newsletter: 
https://www.apopia.com/newsletter-subscription

Find out more about the Apopia fantasy world:
https://www.instagram.com/apopiagame/
https://twitter.com/ApopiaWorld/
https://www.facebook.com/ApopiaWorld
